data.name: CheckCommandDescription
data.value: Read hash sums from the FILEs and check them.

data.name: AlgorithmOptionDescription
data.value: The hash algorithm implementation to use. Supported values: sha, sha1, md5, sha256, sha384, sha512.

data.name: FilesArgumentDescription
data.value: A list of files to process. If the list is empty (or first FILE is -), data is read from standard input.

data.name: InvalidHashStringError
data.value: [ERROR] Unexpected data format: invalid hash string.

data.name: InvalidFileNameError
data.value: [ERROR] Unexpected data format: invalid file name.

data.name: InvalidChecksumStringError
data.value: [ERROR] Unexpected data format: invalid checksum string.
